sentences.english: Skywalk in Bangkok, Thailand, which connects three express stations in downtown.
sentences.chinese: 曼谷空中走廊，於市中心連結三個捷運站。

sentences.english: Since the flood arrived in Bangkok, the 52-year-old has been working seven days a week.
sentences.chinese: 自曼谷發生水災以來，52歲的素普朗每週工作7天。

sentences.english: Pastry Chef Instructor, Institute Vatel – Hotel management, Bangkok.
sentences.chinese: 曼谷，瓦岱勒酒店管理學院，麪點大廚導師。

sentences.english: The Balds will go to Bangkok next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾德一家下星期一要到曼谷去。

sentences.english: Anti-coup activists rally in front of the Government House in Bangkok August 1, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 反對政變的社會運動者在泰國曼谷政府大廈前集合。

sentences.english: UDD supporters have held protests in Bangkok for more than a month.
sentences.chinese: UDD支持者在曼谷舉行抗議已經超過一個月的時間。

sentences.english: Bill Berger leads the U.S. Disaster Assistance Response Team, whose members are waiting for visas in Bangkok.
sentences.chinese: 美國救災應急小組的成員正在曼谷等待入境簽證。

sentences.english: Jocelyn: Bangkok, which is the capital of Thailand , is surrounded by gorgeous palaces and temples.
sentences.chinese: 泰國首都曼谷，那邊到處都是輝煌華麗的皇宮和寺廟。

sentences.english: An anti-free trade protester stands in front of the Japanese Embassy in Bangkok, April 3, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 反自由貿易的抗議者站在泰國曼谷的日本大使館前。

sentences.english: Recently a Bangkok Post editorial accused China of “Killing the Mekong”.
sentences.chinese: 最近《曼谷郵報》一篇社論譴責中國“謀殺湄公河”。

sentences.english: The last type is the express boats sailing between downtown Bkk and the surrounding areas.
sentences.chinese: 最後一種是爲曼谷商業城以及周邊區域的快遞船隻。

sentences.english: It gives me great pleasure to attend the 65th Commission Session of the United Nations Economic and Social Committee for Asia and the Pacific (ESCAP).
sentences.chinese: 很高興來曼谷出席聯合國亞太經社會第65屆會議。

sentences.english: It gives me great pleasure to attend the 65th Commission Session of the United Nations Economic and Social  Committee for Asia and the Pacific (ESCAP).
sentences.chinese: 很高興來曼谷出席聯合國亞太經社會第65屆會議。

sentences.english: The Bon Gai community in central Bangkok was at the center of fighting.
sentences.chinese: 該邦蓋在曼谷市中心的社區是在戰鬥的中心。

sentences.english: The Constitution of the Asia-Pacific Telecommunity was signed in Bangkok, Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲太平洋地區組織章程》在泰國曼谷簽訂。

sentences.english: Which is why he flew to Bangkok a few months ago to take the CFA exam.
sentences.chinese: 這也是他幾個月前飛到曼谷參加CFA考試的原因。

definition: Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Kota Kinabalu (capital of Sabah state, Malaysia)
Ho Chi Minh City a.k.a. Saigon, Vietnam
Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia
